actions.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides an additional $500,000 (by offset) for the treatment of post-traumatic stress disorder in active duty soldiers and veterans.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase funding for the Defense Health Program account (intended for PTSD) by $500,000 offset by a similar reduction in the Environment Restoration, Army account.
